hiveArticle.title: ColorChallenge - Thursday Green - Sand Art
hiveArticle.body:
If you would have visited any beach you might have played with the sand but have you ever seen live sand art in the making. I have seen it in my recent visit to a beach and sharing some of the art photos all made by hand.

![IMG_20180108_172424.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmfKt61DDcBbiZWqvpUukayugFCbWLZEFZPHjg7U5X9o6L/IMG_20180108_172424.jpg)

<hr>

![IMG_20180108_172416.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSw4KSUUxv1E6yGeBDBwnRK6z4svvUmV3pjWydBScah3y/IMG_20180108_172416.jpg)
